line.comment: * Should never happen; this is only if it so happens that, during computation, another station is destroyed while this script is executing.
* ZH 2.1 added safety after a bug report of Xenons who conquered a sector with a player mining station
* The only stations at this point are any surviving stations owned by the sector's owner, pirate base (if any), or trading station (if any)
* Add-Ons 1.4.21: Don't return null simply because the station owner isn't a company.
* Spawn a defensive fleet. From Mayhem.GameCreator.SpawnXenons. We only do that here.
* Add-Ons 1.4.21: Insane mode spawns more defenders.
* Add-Ons 1.4.23: On insane mode, reduced number of defenders if you join the OCV.
* Add-Ons 1.4.23: Insane mode now spawns either a Xenon Q or Xenon C.
* Didn't join OCV - Xenon are hostile and spawn more defenders.
* Zero Hour: clear any trading station

sval.val: Should never happen; this is only if it so happens that, during computation, another station is destroyed while this script is executing.
ZH 2.1 added safety after a bug report of Xenons who conquered a sector with a player mining station
The only stations at this point are any surviving stations owned by the sector's owner, pirate base (if any), or trading station (if any)
Add-Ons 1.4.21: Don't return null simply because the station owner isn't a company.
Spawn a defensive fleet. From Mayhem.GameCreator.SpawnXenons. We only do that here.
Add-Ons 1.4.21: Insane mode spawns more defenders.
Add-Ons 1.4.23: On insane mode, reduced number of defenders if you join the OCV.
Add-Ons 1.4.23: Insane mode now spawns either a Xenon Q or Xenon C.
Didn't join OCV - Xenon are hostile and spawn more defenders.
Zero Hour: clear any trading station
